title: Customer Data Security Analysis
subtitle: Operations Team Analysis - Data Classification Analysis
executive_summary:
Our analysis of 10 data fields reveals significant opportunities for
process automation while maintaining appropriate security controls.

KEY FINDINGS:
• 1 of 10 fields (10%) are ready for immediate automation
• 4 fields require enhanced security measures before processing
• Overall data classification confidence: 51%
• Risk profile: HIGH - appropriate controls identified

BUSINESS IMPACT:
• Potential reduction in manual data processing: 10%
• Enhanced compliance through automated security classification
• Improved data governance and audit capabilities
• Foundation established for scalable automation workflows

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
• Implement automated processing for low-risk, high-confidence fields
• Deploy security measures for sensitive data categories
• Establish governance framework for ongoing data classification
• Begin pilot automation program with identified safe data sets

slides.title: Automation Opportunities

slides.title: Risk Assessment Details
slides.subtitle: Priority Areas and Required Actions
slides.content:
RISK ASSESSMENT SUMMARY:

• 1 fields classified as TOP SECRET require immediate attention
  - These contain highly sensitive data (SSN, credit cards, etc.)
  - Immediate tokenization and access restriction required

• 3 fields require standard security measures
  - Selective masking and access controls sufficient

PRIORITY FIELDS REQUIRING IMMEDIATE ACTION:
• ssn: IMMEDIATE TOKENIZATION - Replace with irreversible tokens
slides.speaker_notes: Detail the specific security measures needed

slides.title: Automation Implementation Plan
slides.subtitle: Recommended Fields and Expected Impact
slides.content:
AUTOMATION READINESS ASSESSMENT:

• 1 fields identified as safe for immediate automation
• 9 fields require manual review before automation

RECOMMENDED FOR AUTOMATION:
• customer_id (customer_id) - Confidence: 90%

ESTIMATED MANUAL WORK REDUCTION: 10%
slides.speaker_notes: Present the roadmap for automation deployment
